name: passive-aggressive-email-translator-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension that identifies and translates passive aggressive email in Gmail client

scripts.watch: npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-js
scripts.copy-files: cpy manifest.json dist && cpy src/extensionInjector.js dist && cpy src/background.js dist && cpy icons dist/icons
scripts.stage: mkdir dist || echo Dist already exists.
scripts.build: npm run stage && npm run copy-files && npm run build-sass && npm run build-js

author: Dima Vishnevetsky (DiMsHiK)
